profile: HOTWIRE ELECTRIC 416-553-5533 PLEASE EMAIL info@hotwire-electric.com http://www.casaguru.com/web/hotwire-electric-all-inc Twitter: @hotwire2001 HGTV FIND A PRO: http://www.hgtv.ca/findapro/details/?business_id=32279088&project_name=home%20renovation&service_name=electrical&location=Vaughan,Ontario&search_id=17033160664 Website: www.hotwire-electric.com For over 10 years, we have successfully designed and provided quality electrical services and solutions to our clients. From custom homes to potlight installations and everything in between such as panels and service upgrades, Hotwire Electric-All can meet your electrical needs. We have build our reputation on quality workmanship and impeccable customer service. Coupled with personalized electrical design and advise to suit each individual client. At Hotwire Electric, our certified electricians are 110% committed to serving our clients with great service, honesty, and most important integrity. We offer a full spectrum of services for residential homes and commerical sites, from small projects to large. We strive to be efficient, neat and organized. We ensure our customers’ satisfaction from beginning to end. From basic electrical wiring to high-end lighting design, home automation and million dollar custom homes we insist on paying attention to detail and providing superior workmanship every step of the way. For us, no job is too big or too small Contact us for a quote today and see the Hotwire difference in your project! We offer our residential and commercial services 7 days a week. Contact us for your free estimate on your electrical projects. Hotwire Electric-All in is a fully insured and an authorized electrical contractor with the Electrical Safety Authority. Check out esasafe.com to view our listing. profile:
Get the best Christmas light installation In Hamiton, Burlington and Oakville ON

Dazzle your friends, family, customers, and colleagues this holiday season with Christmas light installation! 

At Bucket Brigade Exterior Cleaning, our team of technicians is ready to turn your residential or commercial property into a festive winter wonderland with top-quality lights and customer service. We strive to provide Christmas lighting solutions that you’ll fall in love with from initial design up to postseason storage. Whether you’re looking for a few white lights or an elaborate display of multiple colors, we’ve got your back this holiday season. 

We can’t wait to make your Christmas light design dreams come true!

Do you live in the GTAH and want your windows sparkling clean? We are a fantastic window cleaning business that guarantees you have pleasant views of the outdoors. By ensuring that the windows are spotless and providing enough light, we help to improve your property. Our services will assist you in appreciating the sights all around you with clean windows. Commercial building windows are also among our areas of expertise. We’ll make certain that your building stands out from the crowd. Our expert cleaners will turn your windows into a stunning display. Our team has years of experience and we look forward to servicing your property soon.

If you’re seeking gutter cleaning that’s professional and dependable you’ve come to the correct spot. We at Bucket Brigade Exterior Cleaning are the company to call if you want all of your gutter cleaning services. We provide high-quality gutter cleaning in the area, allowing customers to keep their feet safely on the ground. Our team of skilled technicians are highly trained and qualified for the gutter cleaning work we provide and will always treat your home as if it were their own. There is no other company in the area that delivers the results we do. For high-quality work and fantastic customer care, there’s only one company you need: Bucket Brigade Exterior Cleaning.

To top it off, 2% of all revenue goes to The Child and Youth Mental Health Program at McMaster Children’s Hospital because we believe giving back to our community is crucial. Please contact us today for more information on our services or to get started!
services:
